statements: SELECT * FROM movies ORDER BY movie_id DESC;
SELECT movie_title, release_year FROM movies WHERE release_year > 2000;
SELECT movie_id, movie_title FROM movies WHERE movie_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE movie_title LIKE '%Star%';
SELECT movie_id, release_year FROM movies ORDER BY release_year ASC;
SELECT movie_id, movie_title, release_year FROM movies WHERE release_year > 2000 ORDER BY movie_title DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE movie_title LIKE 'The%' AND release_year BETWEEN 1990 AND 2000 ORDER BY release_year ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT movie_title, COUNT(*) AS num_movies FROM movies GROUP BY movie_title HAVING num_movies > 1 ORDER BY num_movies DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT release_year FROM movies ORDER BY release_year;
SELECT movie_title, release_year FROM movies WHERE release_year IS NULL ORDER BY movie_title ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT title, release_year FROM movies ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM actors WHERE birth_year > 1990;
SELECT title FROM movies WHERE release_year >= 2000 ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT name, birth_year FROM actors WHERE movie_id = 1;
SELECT id, title, release_year FROM movies;
SELECT title, id, release_year FROM movies ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT id, title, release_year FROM movies WHERE release_year > 2000;
SELECT title, release_year FROM movies WHERE release_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010;
SELECT id, title, release_year FROM movies WHERE title LIKE '%Matrix%';
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT title, year FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT title, director FROM movies WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT * FROM actors WHERE age < 30;
SELECT name, gender FROM actors WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Drama';
SELECT title, year FROM movies WHERE director = 'Christopher Nolan';
SELECT title, genre, director FROM movies ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT title, year, genre, director FROM movies ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT m.title, a.name FROM movies m JOIN movie_actors ma ON m.id = ma.movie_id JOIN actors a ON ma.actor_id = a.actor_id;
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT title, director FROM movies WHERE release_year > 2010;
SELECT movie_id, title, director FROM movies WHERE director = 'Christopher Nolan';
SELECT actor_id, name, nationality FROM actors WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT movie_id, role, name FROM movie_cast WHERE movie_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE release_year > 2000;
SELECT title, director FROM movies ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT name, date_of_birth, nationality FROM actors WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM movie_cast JOIN actors ON movie_cast.actor_id = actors.actor_id;
SELECT m.title, a.name, mc.role FROM movies m JOIN movie_cast mc ON m.movie_id = mc.movie_id JOIN actors a ON mc.actor_id = a.actor_id ORDER BY m.title DESC, mc.role ASC;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT title, release_year FROM movies WHERE release_year >= 2000 ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM actors WHERE age < 30;
SELECT title, genre FROM movies ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT * FROM directors;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE release_year > 2000 ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT title, genre FROM movies WHERE genre='Action' OR genre='Adventure' ORDER BY release_year ASC;
SELECT m.title, a.name FROM movies m JOIN movie_actors ma ON m.movie_id = ma.movie_id JOIN actors a ON ma.actor_id = a.actor_id WHERE a.age < 30;
SELECT d.name AS director_name, count(md.movie_id) AS movie_count FROM directors d JOIN movie_directors md ON d.director_id = md.director_id GROUP BY director_name ORDER BY movie_count DESC;

SELECT m.title AS movie_title, a.name AS actor_name, d.name AS director_name FROM movies m JOIN movie_actors ma ON m.movie_id = ma.movie_id JOIN actors a ON ma.actor_id = a.actor_id JOIN movie_directors md ON m.movie_id = md.movie_id JOIN directors d ON md.director_id = d.director_id;
